activities:
AppDirect collects personal information from the EU for the purpose of processing credit card payments on behalf of the data owner.

Once collected, we maintain that data within AppDirect in order to deliver our services via an account on our internal systems utilizing this data. This account created on behalf of the data owner who pays for our services. 

We do not use this data for any other purposes, unless instructed to, and authorized by, the data owner.

recoursemech:
We have an internal process with reviews at management and executive levels of all complaints arising from our privacy policy. This process includes review by the companies Information Security Officer and our Legal Counsel.  We are also a member of the BBB EU Safe Harbor program and also have a process to answer any and all complaints regarding privacy and personal data.

We have listed in our Privacy Policy the methods to contact us (via phone, email or in person). Once a complaint is received, a ticket is opened within our systems to track the complaint from start to finish, with management review at each step, ending with an executive level review of the resolution to the issue. 

Both our Information Security Office and Corporate Legal Counsel are involved in reviewing all complaints as part of this process.
